A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Completely unexpected and new\, The Last Jedi takes Star Wars to places we've never seen before. I'm not just talking about actual locations but the tone and the ideas and the philosophy that happens in this film is beyond incredible. People will always hate good movies for reasons beyond normal people's comprehension\, but this movie delivers where Star Wars has been lacking or never had in the first place. Complete masterpiece.
